summary: A command‑line utility that reads a TTS dataset manifest, applies configurable text normalization (optionally lower‑casing) to each entry using a Hydra‑instantiated normalizer, processes entries in parallel with joblib, and writes a new manifest that includes the normalized text in a 'normalized_text' field.
business_intent: To prepare and clean text data for training text‑to‑speech models, ensuring consistent and efficiently pre‑processed transcripts that speed up model training.
